mapper.select: select r.id, r.name, r.description, r.sort, if(sru.user_id is null, 0, 1) as flag from s_role r left join s_role_user sru on sru.role_id = r.id and sru.user_id = #{request.userId} order by r.sort desc
select u.id as userId from user u left join s_role_user sru on sru.user_id = u.id where sru.role_id = #{roleId}
